text: maximus is a company that is largely
all about connecting citizens either at
the state level
or at the national level with a variety
of
health and human services over the last
four or five months we've gone from
having a fairly small number of people
that work from home permanently to
having over 25 000 people
regularly using workspaces so one of the
services that we provide
for a lot of states is a variety of call
center services
where we are connecting either
constituents looking for health care
services
or they're looking for other citizen
services
and those call centers much like the
customers that we serve
were closed because of covet and we were
put in a position where we had to very
quickly
turn what were fixed call center
facilities into completely virtual call
center
facilities and do that within a couple
of weeks
of course the the first thing we had to
do is make sure that we maintained
the integrity of the information and the
security of the information
that we were handling on behalf of our
customer
and that's where amazon workspaces came
in we were able to very quickly work
with amazon
to take that session
from our cloud-based telephony embed it
into an amazon workspace
and extend it out to at least 24 000
employees
and our ability to very quickly stand up
a large number of workspaces is
really critical many of the contracts
and the opportunities that we've
received
literally require us to be able to stand
up a thousand seats
in the course of a week what we've found
with
incorporating amazon workspaces into
that model is it gives us quite a bit of
flexibility to really look at
teams by task and figure out which ones
of them
are frankly capable of working from home
indefinitely
and that's a big plus both from a cost
savings perspective but also from an
employee engagement and employee
satisfaction perspective it gives a lot
of
flexibility to the work style of our
individual employees
these new technologies it takes us out
of
the role of spinning up hardware and
takes us
into a role of providing more structured
services
more helpful services
